CIRCULAR NO. 2/2004

Sub: Courtesy towards Honourable Members of Parliament at airports,

In continuation to this Bureau Circular No. 1/2004 dated 6.1.2004, the following
instructions shall be strictly adhered to by all concerned :

(i) The persons of various agencies deployed at civil airports / civil enclaves in
India shall ensure that due courtesy is extended to Honourable Members of
Parliament during their visit to airports

(ii) One time Airport Entry Permit shall be issued to one personal staff of each
Hon'ble Member of Parliament when requested for.

(iii) | Hon'ble Members of Parliament shall be allowed entry into. the passengers
terminal buildings ( upto check -in or baggage claim area, as the case
may be) on the basis of their Identity Cards. The CISF personnel / APS
staff shall be properly briefed for this purpose

Wye
